tossup_question: -   –  Some herbivores, such as rabbits and horses, possess the ability to digest cellulose with the aid of bacteria located in a pouch at the beginning of the large intestine. What is the name of this pouch?
bonus_question: -   –  What structures, composed of nine sets of triplet microtubules arranged in a ring, play a role in eukaryotic cell division, but are not present in plant cells?
